de.systemagmbh.tools.math
Class CSysPropertyDistribution

java.lang.Object
  de.systemagmbh.tools.math.CSysPropertyDistribution
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISysListable, ISysNamedDiscreteDistribution
public class CSysPropertyDistribution
extends Object
implements ISysNamedDiscreteDistribution, ISysListable

A CSysPropertyDistribution is something like a classiffication for named, countable things It is useful to count named things and visualize: Like bars that have names and height or pie charts that have names and size etc.

Warning Requires Java 2.

Version:
$Revision: 1.5 $
Author:
S. Angloher, H.Helmstreit

          Create a CSysPropertyDistribution.
 
Method Summary
 void add(ISysNamedDiscreteDistribution toadd)
          Add a NamedDiscreteDistribution to the current values; If a name in the added distribution is not found in the current class, this name/value is appended; If a name in the added distribution is found in the current class, the value is increased accordingly.

add

public void add(ISysNamedDiscreteDistribution toadd)
Add a NamedDiscreteDistribution to the current values; If a name in the added distribution is not found in the current class, this name/value is appended; If a name in the added distribution is found in the current class, the value is increased accordingly.

Specified by:
add in interface ISysNamedDiscreteDistribution
Parameters:
toadd - The NamedDiscreteDistribution, which is added.
